General.Name: Mahachai Hospital Public Company Limited
General.Description: Mahachai Hospital Public Company Limited operates private hospitals under the Mahachai Hospital name in Thailand. It is also involved in the trading of medical and other supplies. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.
General.Address: 927/43 K., Settakij 1 Road, Samut Sakhon, Thailand, 74000
